snippet: DOMBECK--Charles. The Board of Trustees and staff of YAI mourn the loss of Charles 'Chuck' Dombeck, who served on the YAI Board for 23 years. His commit-ment and dedication to people with developmental disabilities, their families, and our staff was unparalleled. We extend our deepest condolences to his family and friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DOMBECK--Charles. The Board of Trustees and staff of YAI mourn the loss of Charles 'Chuck' Dombeck, who served on the YAI Board for 23 years. His commit-ment and dedication to people with developmental disabilities, their families, and our staff was unparalleled. We extend our deepest condolences to his family and friends. 1/3
